result.reason: Added 'Open in Browser' functionality for HTTP/HTTPS connections, a logical and common enhancement.
result.approach: Added a new 'Open in Browser' menu item to the connection context menu. This item is enabled only for HTTP/HTTPS connections and, when clicked, opens the connection's URL in the default browser.
